==== inferringClassMembersFromAssignments7.js (7 errors) ====
    class C {
        constructor() {
            var self = this
            self.x = 1
                 ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'x' does not exist on type 'C'.
            self.m = function() {
                 ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'm' does not exist on type 'C'.
                console.log(self.x)
                                 ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'x' does not exist on type 'C'.
            }
        }
        mreal() {
            var self = this
            self.y = 2
                 ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'y' does not exist on type 'C'.
        }
    }
    const c = new C()
    c.x
      ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'x' does not exist on type 'C'.
    c.y
      ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'y' does not exist on type 'C'.
    c.m()
      ~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'm' does not exist on type 'C'.
